content: this legal text discusses the progress of a case involving the dissolution of a community inheritance the court has declared the dissolution of the community inheritance of the deceased individuals ba pa and ro and has assigned specific properties to the heirs based on a division plan provided by an expert witness the court has also addressed various claims made by the parties dismissing some and granting others the judgment is provisionally enforceable and the costs of the proceedings will be shared by the parties in a separate ruling the court has rejected claims and objections brought by ba ba de ba sa and a counterclaim filed by the other party the court has declared the open successions of ba pa and ro stating that their properties will be divided among their respective children additionally the court has dissolved the community property and inheritance of ba pa and ro dividing the properties among the heirs the court has ordered ba ba de and ba sa to pay certain adjustment amounts and has rejected the claims brought by the applicant and defendants the costs of the proceedings will be shared by the parties and the costs of the experts report will be borne jointly and severally the judgment is provisionally enforceable by law

metadata.CASE_ID: Tribunale Reggio Calabria sez. II, 31/05/2017, n.869
